entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
